submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumOperations(self, nums: List[int], target: List[int]) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        total = 0
        prev = 0
        diff = [0]+[target[i]-nums[i] for i in range(n)]
        for i in range(1,n+1):
            # check sign to see whether change sign
            if (diff[i-1] < 0 and diff[i] > 0) or (diff[i-1] > 0 and diff[i] < 0):
                prev = 0
                total += abs(diff[i])
                prev = abs(diff[i])
            if diff[i] == 0:
                prev = 0
                continue
            # if same sign, add diff if its larger, else 0
            total += max(0, abs(diff[i])-prev)
            prev = abs(diff[i])
        return total
